channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 12:28 Attack Dronov-Kamikadzerukh on the city
item.description: 🟠 12:28 Attack Dronov-Kamikadzerukh on the city#m_nikopol_that_nikopol_ territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
